group_1.textCenter: Here's a new menu item for Cafe LycoReco…
We're a cafe that serves coffee and creative@sweets.
That said, we've had some requests from@customers to make more substantial meals.
Based on that,  I added a few more@accompaniments.
I also paid careful attention to its appearance@and aesthetics.

group_1.textLeft: This is…erm…

group_1.textRight: …I don't know what to say.

group_1.textLeft: Oh, is something wrong?

group_1.textRight: …No. If I'm going to critique it, it's only right@that I do so after eating…
Huh… It tastes just fine.

group_1.textLeft: The taste…?

group_1.textRight: …May I ask more about the idea behind@this dish?

group_1.textLeft: Of course.@As implied by the "Welcome to LycoReco" title...
The idea is to evoke the image of guests@being welcomed.

group_1.textRight: So the sausages are meant to look like hands...?

group_1.textLeft: Yes, I used five of them to form a hand@to welcome guests.

group_1.textRight: And the eyes…

group_1.textLeft: I thought it'd make it look cuter.

group_1.textRight: And these spatters of ketchup…

group_1.textLeft: I added a splash of color to make it look@more fun.

group_1.textRight: If the idea behind this dish was horror or@Halloween, it would work…
But this absolutely will not do!

group_1.textLeft: I-it…won't…?

group_1.textRight: But don't lose heart!
You have an excellent sense of aesthetics…
And you have the super beauty Ria Ami here@by your side!

group_1.textLeft: You're going to help me?

group_1.textRight: Of course! I'll improve your decorating skills.

group_1.textLeft: I can't possibly thank you enough, Mia Amy!

group_1.textRight: Ugh! No! [chara:301001:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:301001:cheek_0][chara:301001:face_mtn_ex_020.exp3.json][chara:301001:lipSynch_1]It's Ria Ami!

group_1.textLeft: Th-there we go!

group_1.textRight: It's a true work of art! I'm a master chef as well,@as if there were any doubt!
She's strutting around like she actually@accomplished something…
Erm… What do you call these lavish and@luxurious pancakes…?

group_1.textLeft: We dub it…

group_1.narration: "The Elegant Cutie Japanese-Style@Delicious Beauty Power Pancakes!"

group_1.textLeft: Served with coffee.

group_1.textRight: …It's a veritable tower of pancakes.
…I'm curious, why do you specify@"Japanese-style"?

group_1.textLeft: Because we used traditional confectioneries@for the toppings.
In this case, they're ones bought from a nearby@convenience store,
but given that we serve them at Cafe LycoReco,
I thought it would be suitable to add them@to the dish.
Don't just ask questions! Give it a try.

group_1.textRight: Erm… Where exactly did you get this idea@for a…tower…?

group_1.textLeft: The trick is to eat the tower from the top so@it doesn't collapse.

group_1.textRight: …And now you're calling it a tower too.
Well.. Th-thanks, I guess…
…Huh, it actually tastes good.

group_1.textLeft: Then I'll add it to Cafe LycoReco's menu!

group_1.textRight: Um, I don't want to rain on your parade, but…
How much do you plan on charging for this?@You'd lose money unless you charge a mortgage…

group_1.textLeft: What have I done…?
If you can't sell it, why not make it exclusive@for the staff instead?

group_1.textRight: Who are you, the queen of France?
If they can't sell it, it can't be made for@the staff either.

group_1.textLeft: But it's so delicious!@Surely they can make an exception!

group_1.textRight: It sounds like you just want to eat it@for yourself…
Well, it's up to you if you want to sell it or not.
At any rate, you've got the skills to make@staff meals now.
Be proud, Takina!

group_1.textLeft: …That's right.@This is…part of growth, isn't it?
Thank you so much, Manaka.
You too, Mina Ari.

group_1.textRight: Why is this so hard for you?!@It's RIA AMI!
Still, you're welcome! In our hands, this was@a piece of cake!

group_1.textLeft: Onto the next one, then.

group_1.textRight: Next…?

group_1.textLeft: That's right, I'm off to meet the teacher for@my next training session.
Oh yes, those pancakes are my way of@thanking you. I hope you enjoy them.

group_1.textRight: Ah, sure…!
She looks so cool and collected, but she blows@in and out like a hurricane.

group_1.textLeft: I don't think that's something she'd want@to hear…

group_1.textCenter: I can't keep losing.@I must do this.
